模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble

类 GamePanel

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.bubblebobble.GamePanel
public class GamePanel extends Object
The GamePanel is where the entire game is constantly updated and accept keyboard input. After every few milliseconds, GamePanel calls the methods that update its InteractableWorld, then repaints the window to display the new drawn graphics.

    private class 
    GamePanel.KeyProcess
    KeyProcess is an inner class of GamePanel in charge of accept keyboard input.
    private class 
    GamePanel.Refresh
    Refresh is an inner class of GamePanel in charge of refreshing the game.
